text: HackerRank | Prepare Certify Compete Apply Search   1  All Contests SRBD Code Contest - 2024 (Round 1) Aragorn is Gone  Aragorn is Gone locked Problem Submissions Discussions Time Limit: ++ Memory Limit: In the realm of Middle-earth, a formidable and malevolent force emerged. Sauron, the Lord of the Rings, aspired to subjugate all of Middle-earth and mold it according to his will. To aid in his quest for dominion, he forged the One Ring, a weapon of immense power. Before Sauron's might, Aragorn, the king of Gondor, was defeated and forced to abandon his kingdom. Currently Sauron has a special army called Orcforces consisting of N Orcs(a race of evil, humanoid creatures). The energy level of Orc is denoted by ( ). Now Sauron needs to form a team by choosing one or multple Orcs from this army such that the overall energy of the team is divisible by the size of the team. To defeat Sauron, Aragorn the king needs to know the total number of ways Sauron can form a team modulo . Can you help Aragorn to ﬁnd this number and save Middle-earth? Input Format Input starts with an integer denoting test cases. For each test case, input starts with a integer — the total number of Orc in the army. Next line contains integers - energy level of Orc. Constraints It is guaranteed that the overall summation of is Output Format For each case, print the case number followed by the result in a single line Follow the samples for the exact output format. Sample Input 0 2 5 1 2 3 4 5 7 1 2 2 1 0 1 1 Sample Output 0 Case 1: 15 Case 2: 51     Interview Prep | Blog | Scoring | Environment | FAQ | About Us | Support | Careers | Terms Of Service | Privacy Policy | Submissions: 227 Max Score: 1 Rate This Challenge: More      Test against custom input  ⚙C  Line: 1 Col: 1 Run Code Submit CodeUpload Code as File #include <stdio.h> #include <string.h> #include <math.h> #include <stdlib.h> int main() {    /* Enter your code here.
